item.title: DeepSeek-R1 vs DeepSeek-V3: Detailed Comparison
item.content:encoded:
DeepSeek has made significant strides in AI model development, with the release of DeepSeek-V3 in December 2024, followed by the groundbreaking R1 in January 2025. DeepSeek-V3 is a Mixture-of-Experts (MoE) model that focuses on maximizing efficiency without compromising performance. DeepSeek-R1, on the other hand, incorporates reinforcement learning to enhance reasoning and decision-making. In this DeepSeek-R1 […]
